about_the_game:
Hi! I would like to first start by mentioning that this game is still in development.
If you would like to keep up to date with the progress, please feel free to wishlist or follow our development logs on YouTube.
Thank you :)

Welcome to Advenclave, an open-world action RPG where you play as a Librarian of the Grand Archive, a wondrous flying library that houses a vast collection of magical tomes. Using the portal system, you'll journey through the realms, armed with a magical grimoire to fill with your own story. Your ultimate goal is to learn spells, explore new realms, meet fascinating NPCs, and engage in thrilling combat.

Advenclave boasts a variety of features that will keep you entertained for hours. Here are some of the features you can expect:

Features
  • Open-world gameplay: Explore the vast open world of Advenclave, from bustling cities to the darkest corners of the realms.
  • Spell learning: Collect and learn spells to add to your grimoire, and use them in combat and exploration.
  • Thrilling combat: Engage in action-packed battles with enemies using your magical spells and weapons.
  • Quests: Embark on exciting quests to uncover the secrets of Advenclave and gain rewards.
  • NPC interaction: Meet fascinating NPCs, learn their stories, and interact with them to unlock new abilities and spells.
  • Frog-based portal system: Leave the Grand Archive via a portal system. Collect runes to access new realms and worlds.
  • Grand Archive: Work with the Head Librarian of the Grand Archive to chronicle your adventures and cement your place in the halls of history.

name: Advenclave
short_description: Join the Grand Archive in Advenclave - an open world action RPG. You are tasked with filling a magical grimoire with your own story. Learn spells, engage in thrilling combat, and work with the Head Librarian to chronicle your adventures. Explore different realms and cement your place in history!
